title: Apple Daily English Version included for English speakers

replies.msg:
Apple Daily English Version included for

English speakers please install the app


Android
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nextmedia&hl=en

An Apple A Day Keeps The Fake News Away!



Apple Daily’s all-new English Edition is now available.


Install Apple Daily app latest version (5.5.0), click 'English' in the upper right corner of the screen.


'Editor's Selection' includes a rich offering of topical news, in-depth reports, interviews, columnists' essays, opinion pieces, and other features.

CCP voted to impose a national security law on Hong Kong. Their move would erode human rights, freedom and autonomy in the city. Working as a guardian and protector of civil society, Apple Daily diligently holds the Hong Kong and Beijing governments accountable; uncovering political scandals and wrongdoings of people in power, exposing government ineptitude and oppression, and reporting the truth to its readers.


Introducing Apple Daily’s all-new English Edition

We are proud to announce the launch of our new English platform via mobile application to serve our international English-speaking readership.

Uncovering the Truth— confronting injustice and oppression.

Since the founding of our Apple Daily in 1995, we have never wavered from our pursuit of freedom and spoken truth.


Journalism prizes won:


The Society of Publishers in Asia (SOPA) Awards 2019:
- Winner of Excellence in Human Rights Reporting - Hong Kong in Political Storm: Beijing Disqualifies the Entire Younger Generation
- Winner of Excellence in Explanatory Reporting - Controversy over the world’s first gene-edited twins: a critical review
- Winner of Excellence in Reporting Breaking News - African Swine Fever inches closer to Hong Kong
- Honorable Mention for Excellence in Reporting Breaking News - HK devastated by Typhoon Manghkhut

23rd Human Rights Press Awards (2019), organized by The Foreign Correspondents’ Club Hong Kong, Amnesty International and the Hong Kong Journalists Association:
- Winner of Breaking News Writing - Liu Xia Arrives in Germany for Treatment; Fulfilling Liu Xiaobo’s Last Wish; Freedom in the End
- Merit Prize in Investigative Feature Writing - Series: Scandal of the Shatin to Central Link

Support Apple Daily; Let the Truth go Viral.

Our new English Platform offers a daily "Editor's Selection" providing news and analysis on important issues in Hong Kong and mainland China that are firmly based on the best principles of fearless Fourth Estate journalism. The "Editor's Selection" includes a rich offering of topical news, in-depth reports, interviews, columnists' essays, opinion pieces, and other features.


Know the uncensored Truth in HK and Mainland China. Subscribe to Apple Daily.
"An apple a day keeps the fake news away!"


For any inquiries or questions, please contact us in the following ways:

1. Email: cs@nextdigital.com.hk
2. Facebook messenger customer chat: https://hk.adai.ly/e/fbcs
Operation Hours: Monday to Sunday 09:00-20:00(HKT)
Enquiry received after Operation Hours will be responded on next service day.

【Subscription Service Agreement and Terms and Conditions (Hong Kong and Macau Areas)】
Please visit NEXT Member Centre for Subscription Services Terms & Condition (Overseas users)
